programme.title: Forgive Me. Thank You.
programme.desc: A computer science fresh graduate finds himself unable to secure a job due to his deafness. The discrimination he faces forces him to confront his anxieties and take control of his own destiny.

programme.title: Confetti
programme.desc: Due to her dyslexia, Meimei is ostracized by her school and community. Encouraged by Meimei's teacher from school, Lan leaves everything behind in China for New York City in hopes of finding an education program for her daughter.

programme.title: Commitment Hasan
programme.desc: Farmer Hasan is at a crossroads between challenges and new opportunities. A high-voltage mast can end up in the middle of his fertile and cultivated land. But can this invasion of modernity be resolved now that the neighbouring plot is for sale?

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Silent Night
programme.desc: The owner of the historic Sylt company Betten-Reuter, is found dead and two infamous Santa Clauses are believed to have silenced him. Known for robbery, is the notorious pair really also capable of murder?

programme.title: Binti
programme.desc: Faced with potential deportation as an immigrant, Binti, a 12-year-old vlogger plots a scheme with her new friend to bring their parents together to save her future.

programme.title: Esteban
programme.desc: In Cuba, while helping his single mother sell black market beauty products, a 9-year-old boy dreams of becoming a pianist.

programme.title: Bluebird
programme.desc: In small town Maine, a school bus driver becomes distracted during her end-of-day inspection and fails to notice a sleeping boy in the back of the bus. What happens next shatters the tranquillity of her small logging town.

programme.title: Above the Clouds
programme.desc: After losing his parents in a flood, 15-year-old Andy is forced to live in the Mountain Province with his estranged grandfather. Feeling they’ve lost everything, the two embark on a journey and start to come to terms with their grief.

programme.title: Pure White
programme.desc: Vural, a husband and a father who was raised in faith, leads a seemingly pious and conformist life. Yet, everything takes a sudden dark turn when he learns a truth that will force him to confront his views on religion and morality.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And the Black Angel
programme.desc: An attendee of an angel seminar has been found beaten to death. The case becomes personal for Sievers when suspicions fall on fellow participant Hanne Wegener whom he knows from his past. Feldmann has no choice but to conduct the investigation undercover.

programme.title: Run Up!
programme.desc: After a life-altering accident shatters her dreams, Elodie, a young hiker turned paraplegic, discovers the power of wheelchair sports. With the help of her trainer Isabelle, she is able to awaken from her lethargy and recognize true victories in life.

programme.title: Forgive Me. Thank You.
programme.desc: A computer science fresh graduate finds himself unable to secure a job due to his deafness. The discrimination he faces forces him to confront his anxieties and take control of his own destiny.

programme.title: Nick-Off Duty
programme.desc: When Lenny sets off on a mission to avenge her mother’s murder, she finds herself in trouble with the Russian mob and an underground organ harvesting ring. Her father, Hamburg cop Nick and his partner must race against the clock to rescue her.

programme.title: For A Moment, Forever
programme.desc: A young popstar overwhelmed by fame meets a troubled ex-rocker teaching music to adolescents at a therapy centre. Both longing for love, they get closer as affection for music connects them, but shall they overcome the burdens of his past?

programme.title: Open Door
programme.desc: Rudina embarks on a road trip with her pregnant sister Elma back to their Albanian hometown. However, Elma is unmarried, and they need to find someone to play the part of her husband in order not to anger their traditional father.

programme.title: The Reports on Sarah and Saleem
programme.desc: The illicit affair of a married Palestinian man and a married Israeli woman in Jerusalem takes a dangerous political dimension when they are spotted in the wrong place at the wrong time leaving them to deal with more than their broken marriages.
